name: LoWest
description:
Note: If the Web build of this game should not be working for you, reloading the page might resolve the problem. Otherwise you can download the Windows build below.

LoWest 

This game is an entry for the LOWREZJAM 2019 an has been made in 3 days.

In LoWest you play as a cowboy and have to defeat waves of enemies in this side-scrolling Western style shooter game.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Shoot: Space

Gameplay:

  • Kill all enemies to proceed the level. Enemies (especially bosses) may have multiple life points.
  • If enemies hit you with their attacks or touch you, you lose a life point. The game is over when you have no life points left. Collect hearts () to refill your life points.
  • Collect Power-Ups ( ) to change your weapon type. Collecting multiple Power-Ups of the same color upgrades the ability of your weapon. When you are hit by an enemy, your Power-Up level will be reduced again.

Technical details:

  • The game was made with the Godot game engine.
  • All used assets have been made by ourselves.
